subject: Order #SSN5417
description_text:
Hello,


I'm still waiting for my order to be delivered. Can you tell me more?


Thx

SCHAUB Julien

conversations.body_text: Hi Julien SCHAUB,       We sincerely apologize that this item has been out of stock for nearly two weeks due to demand far exceeding our projections. We will arrange for shipment within the next two days and deeply regret this delay.

Bonjour,

Pas de soucis je suis content d'avoir reçu de vos nouvelles. Ce qui est étrange c'est que j'ai bien reçu un numéro de suivi colis.

Cordialement

Julien Schaub

Envoyé à partir de Outlook pour Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi Julien SCHAUB,     Thank you for your understanding. Here is your shipping tracking link. We will ship your order within the next two days.    https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047224390986
